Publish.LongDescription:
## Magic Mail [MM]
- Control post offices, post-vans, sorting facilities, and post-trucks. - All sliders and toggles are optional - Reset to game defaults (vanilla) or to a quick-start preset. - Provides some 'magic' fixes for the mail system.
### How to Use
- **Quick Start Button** - 1-Click, just set it and forget it (applies recommended defaults). - Adjust post-van **mail load**, post-van **fleet size**, and post-truck **fleet size.** - **Boost speed** and storage capacity for sorting facilities. - Simple city-wide **mail statistics** and recent activity in the options menu.
- **Fix low amount** of Local mail at post offices by magically topping up Local Mail when storage drops below a certain amount (you can choose). - **Fix low unsorted mail** at sorting facilities to keep the sorting active. - **Fix mail overflow** by trimming overfilled mail buffers so they don't remain blocked forever. - This is a workaround solution until CO fixes the mail transfer process.
### 5 Languages
- Français French, Deutsch German, Español Spanish, - English, 简体中文 (Simplified Chinese)
### Compatibility - Safe to remove at any time; postal facilities will fall back to the game's default. - Does not use Harmony or Reflection, less likely to break with game updates.
### Support and Feedback - If the mod helps you, give it a Like :) - Report issues on Github link, Forum link, or Discord
### Credits
- River-Mochi - author and maintainer - Inspired by Infixo's original Postal Helper - BugsyG - testing
